languages.text: "У нас есть имена трубоведов, идентификационные номера, и мы знаем, из какого они клана. Будем давить их, пока он сам не выйдет или кто-нибудь не сознается. Я займусь этим лично". {n}Мастер дисциплины нарочито сжимает рукоять булавы на поясе.{/n} "Наслаждайтесь отдыхом и трапезой, Лорд-капитан. Скоро негодяй будет стоять перед вами".

"We have the pipewardens' names and identification numbers, and we know which clan they are from. We will keep pressing the riffraff until either the culprit confesses or someone turns him in. I will handle this." {n}The Master-at-Arms pointedly grips the maul on her belt.{/n} "Please enjoy your meal in the interim, Lord Captain. The scoundrel will appear before us soon enough."
languages.original_text: "У нас есть имена трубоведов, идентификационные номера, и мы знаем, из какого они клана. Будем давить их, пока он сам не выйдет или кто-нибудь не сознается. Я займусь этим лично". {n}Мастер дисциплины нарочито сжимает рукоять булавы на поясе.{/n} "Наслаждайтесь отдыхом и трапезой, Лорд-капитан. Скоро негодяй будет стоять перед вами".

I will handle this." {n}The Master-at-Arms pointedly grips the maul on her belt.{/n} "Please enjoy your meal in the interim, Lord Captain. The scoundrel will appear before us soon enough."

languages.text: « Nous avons les noms et les matricules des égoutiers, et nous savons à quel clan ils appartiennent. Nous allons continuer à faire pression sur ces misérables jusqu'à ce que le coupable passe aux aveux ou que quelqu'un le dénonce. J'y veillerai personnellement. » {n}La capitaine d'armes empoigne ostensiblement la masse accrochée à sa ceinture.{/n} « Profitez-en pour aller vous restaurer, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le scélérat sera démasqué d'ici peu. »
languages.original_text: "We have the pipewardens' names and identification numbers, and we know which clan they are from. We will keep pressing the riffraff until either the culprit confesses or someone turns him in. I will handle this." {n}The Master-at-Arms pointedly grips the maul on her belt.{/n} "Please enjoy your meal in the interim, Lord Captain. The scoundrel will appear before us soon enough."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons les noms et les matricules des égoutiers, et nous savons à quel clan ils appartiennent. Nous allons continuer à faire pression sur ces misérables jusqu'à ce que le coupable passe aux aveux ou que quelqu'un le dénonce. J'y veillerai personnellement. » {n}La capitaine d'armes empoigne ostensiblement la masse accrochée à sa ceinture.{/n} « Profitez-en pour aller vous restaurer, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le scélérat sera démasqué d'ici peu. »

languages.text: «Tenemos los nombres y números de identificación de los inspectores de tuberías y sabemos a qué clanes pertenecen. Seguiremos presionando a esta chusma hasta que el culpable se entregue o alguien le delate. Yo me encargaré». {n}La maestra de armas sujeta con fuerza la maza de su cinturón.{/n} «Entretanto, disfrute de la comida, Lord Capitán. Pronto tendremos ante nosotros a esa sabandija».
languages.original_text: "We have the pipewardens' names and identification numbers, and we know which clan they are from. We will keep pressing the riffraff until either the culprit confesses or someone turns him in. I will handle this." {n}The Master-at-Arms pointedly grips the maul on her belt.{/n} "Please enjoy your meal in the interim, Lord Captain. The scoundrel will appear before us soon enough."

traits.locale_text: «Tenemos los nombres y números de identificación de los inspectores de tuberías y sabemos a qué clanes pertenecen. Seguiremos presionando a esta chusma hasta que el culpable se entregue o alguien le delate. Yo me encargaré». {n}La maestra de armas sujeta con fuerza la maza de su cinturón.{/n} «Entretanto, disfrute de la comida, Lord Capitán. Pronto tendremos ante nosotros a esa sabandija».

languages.text: “我们已经弄清楚了管道员的姓名与编号，知道他们来自哪个氏族。我们准备继续向那些乌合之众施压，直到那个罪犯招供，或者有人告发他为止。这件事情就交给我处理吧。”{n}戒律大师猛地抓住了腰间的能量锤。{/n}“这段时间里，请您好好用餐吧，舰长大人。用不了多久，这个恶棍就会被带到我们面前了。”
languages.original_text: "We have the pipewardens' names and identification numbers, and we know which clan they are from. We will keep pressing the riffraff until either the culprit confesses or someone turns him in. I will handle this." {n}The Master-at-Arms pointedly grips the maul on her belt.{/n} "Please enjoy your meal in the interim, Lord Captain. The scoundrel will appear before us soon enough."

traits.locale_text: “我们已经弄清楚了管道员的姓名与编号，知道他们来自哪个氏族。我们准备继续向那些乌合之众施压，直到那个罪犯招供，或者有人告发他为止。这件事情就交给我处理吧。”{n}戒律大师猛地抓住了腰间的能量锤。{/n}“这段时间里，请您好好用餐吧，舰长大人。用不了多久，这个恶棍就会被带到我们面前了。”

languages.text: 「パイプ監視員たちの名前と番号、何処のクラン出身かは分かっている。犯人が自白するか、誰かが警察に突き出すまで、私たちはこの悪党どもに圧力をかけ続けます。任せてください」。{n}マスター・アット・アームズはベルトのモールを指差した。{/n} 「その間ロード・キャプテンは食事をお楽しみください。悪党はすぐに我々の前に現れるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We have the pipewardens' names and identification numbers, and we know which clan they are from. We will keep pressing the riffraff until either the culprit confesses or someone turns him in. I will handle this." {n}The Master-at-Arms pointedly grips the maul on her belt.{/n} "Please enjoy your meal in the interim, Lord Captain. The scoundrel will appear before us soon enough."

traits.locale_text: 「パイプ監視員たちの名前と番号、何処のクラン出身かは分かっている。犯人が自白するか、誰かが警察に突き出すまで、私たちはこの悪党どもに圧力をかけ続けます。任せてください」。{n}マスター・アット・アームズはベルトのモールを指差した。{/n} 「その間ロード・キャプテンは食事をお楽しみください。悪党はすぐに我々の前に現れるでしょう」

languages.text: "Wir haben die Namen und ID-Nummern der Rohrhüter, und wir wissen, aus welchem Clan sie stammen. Wir werden den Pöbel weiter unter Druck setzen, bis der Täter gesteht oder ihn jemand verrät. Ich kümmere mich darum." {n}Die Master-at-Arms legt demonstrativ die Hand auf den Streitkolben an ihrem Gürtel.{/n} "Genießt Ihr so lange bitte Euer Essen, Lord Captain. Der Schuft wird schon bald vor uns stehen."
languages.original_text: "We have the pipewardens' names and identification numbers, and we know which clan they are from. We will keep pressing the riffraff until either the culprit confesses or someone turns him in. I will handle this." {n}The Master-at-Arms pointedly grips the maul on her belt.{/n} "Please enjoy your meal in the interim, Lord Captain. The scoundrel will appear before us soon enough."

Wir werden den Pöbel weiter unter Druck setzen, bis der Täter gesteht oder ihn jemand verrät. Ich kümmere mich darum." {n}Die Master-at-Arms legt demonstrativ die Hand auf den Streitkolben an ihrem Gürtel.{/n} "Genießt Ihr so lange bitte Euer Essen, Lord Captain. Der Schuft wird schon bald vor uns stehen."

languages.text: "Hat muhafızlarının isimleriyle kimlik saptama kodları elimizde. Hangi klandan olduklarını da biliyoruz. Suçlu itiraf edene ya da birisi onu ihbar edene dek alt tabakaya baskı yapmayı sürdüreceğiz. Bu hususla ben ilgileneceğim." {n}Silahtar, kemerindeki tokmağı manidar bir şekilde kavrıyor.{/n} "Bu esnada yemeğinizin tadını çıkarın Lord Kaptan. O alçak, pek yakında karşımıza çıkacaktır."
languages.original_text: "We have the pipewardens' names and identification numbers, and we know which clan they are from. We will keep pressing the riffraff until either the culprit confesses or someone turns him in. I will handle this." {n}The Master-at-Arms pointedly grips the maul on her belt.{/n} "Please enjoy your meal in the interim, Lord Captain. The scoundrel will appear before us soon enough."
